console.log("Not a Daily Free Post (code not 11513).");

graphql.query:
mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(
        input: {
            title: "moderation_post"
            media: ["{{new_profile_pic}}"]
            mediadescription: "{{invalid_email}}"
            contenttype: image
        }
        action: POST  
    ) {
        status
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
        }
         
    }
}

console.log("This was a Daily Free Like.");
console.log(`Saved from unfiltered list: posts = ${postCount}, comments = ${commentCount}`);

graphql.query:
query ListPosts {
    listPosts(limit: 20) {
        status
        counter
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    listPosts(limit:20) {
        status
        counter
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
            }
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
query ListPosts {
    listPosts(contentFilterBy: MYGRANDMALIKES, limit:20) {
        status
        counter
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

query GetProfile {
    getProfile(contentFilterBy: MYGRANDMALIKES, userid: "{{w_userid_t2}}") {
        status
        ResponseCode

            id

            status

    }
}

            createdat

                post {

                    createdat

                    amountviews
                    amountcomments
                    amountdislikes
                    amounttrending
                    isliked
                    isviewed

                    isdisliked
                    issaved

                        userid

    getProfile(contentFilterBy: MYGRANDMALIKES, userid: "{{w_userid_t2}}") {
